text:
Could anyone familiar with ComponentArrays explain why this line seems to be type-unstable with `@code_warntype` despite all of the present variables (i.e. `values` ,`start` ,`stop`) being fully known? It's really perplexing me.
```newvalues = ComponentArray(values,(Axis{(edges=start:2:stop,cells=start+1:2:stop-1)}(),))```
